behavior clean_sink(sink:item):
    body:
        scrub(sink) # Scrub the sink to clean any dirt or stains
        rinse(sink) # Rinse the sink to remove any cleaning residue

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and id[sink]==42
        # Select the sink with ID 42
        assert dirty(sink) # Ensure that the sink is indeed dirty before cleaning
        clean_sink(sink) # Clean the sink to achieve the goal of clean the identified bathroom sink
